Vice president of unnamed advertising agency }} '''Steve''' is [[Chandler Bing|Chandler]]'s boss at his internship and [[Monica Geller|Monica]]'s old friend. He appears in "[[The One Where Rachel Goes Back To Work]]", "[[The One With The Mugging]]" and "[[The One With The Lottery]]", when he offers Chandler the job of junior copywriter. He is portrayed by [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Phill_Lewis Phill Lewis]. In "[[The One Where Rachel Goes Back To Work]]", Monica recommends Chandler to Steve for a job position in Steve's company. ==Trivia== *He is portrayed by Phill Lewis, who two years later (2005) would star alongside [[Cole Sprouse]] (who played Ross' son, [[Ben Geller]] from seasons 6-8) in the Disney Channel show, ''[[Wikipedia:The_Suite_Life_of_Zack_%26_Cody|The Suite Life of Zack and Cody]],'' and its spin off, ''[[Wikipedia:The_Suite_Life_on_Deck|The Suite Life on Deck]]''.
